property.Range of values: If SHARED_SERVER_SESSIONS is specified, then it should be less than SESSIONS. If SHARED_SERVER_SESSIONS is not specified, then a shared server session may be created as long as there is a free session slot.

section:
SHARED_SERVER_SESSIONS specifies the total number of shared server sessions to allow. Setting this parameter enables you to reserve user sessions for dedicated servers.

See Also:

Oracle Database Concepts for more information on sessions
seealso: Oracle Database Concepts for more information on sessions
